import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import {Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import { listProductDetails } from '../actions/productActions' import {Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import Loader from "../components/Loader" import Message from '../components/Message' function ProductScreen({match}){ const [qty, setQty] = useState(1) const dispatch = useDispatch() const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetails) const {loading, error, product} = productDetails const { id } = useParams(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductDetails(id)) }, []); const addToCartHandler = () => { console.log('Add to Cart', id, qty) } return(
Go Back {loading ? : error ? {error}: (

{product.name}

Price: ${product.price} {product.description} Price: {product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock': 'Out of Stock'} {product.countInStock > 0 && ( Qty setQty(e.target.value) } > { [...Array(product.countInStock).keys()].map((x)=>( )) } ) } ) }
) } export default ProductScreen
